title: MaxGreen 6503BK M-ATX Casing With PSU
cat_seo_title: Max Green Casing Price in Bangladesh | Star Tech
cat_seo_description: Buy Max Green Casing at best price in BD. Reasonable & lucrative Max Green Casings for your desktop PC. Order online or visit your nearest Star Tech branch.
full_description:
MaxGreen 6503BK M-ATX Casing With PSU

The MaxGreen 6503BK M-ATX Casing is a compact size mini-tower case with a simple design. It has a spacious structure and a stylish appearance. It has a simple bottom LED strip point design. It supports 2 x 12cm fan on the front and 1x8cm fan rear. This casing is supported with Micro-ATX, Mini-ITX motherboards. It has a TOP/ATX PSU Form Factor. The front panel is made of ABS material and on both side panels, there are metal covers. Side cooling air hole structure ensures smooth air circulation to maintain optimum internal temperature.  It comes with a 5.25" (ODD) External Drive Bay. It also has 2x 3.5" (HDD) and 3x 2.5" (SSD) Internal Drive Bays. It comes with High nspeed USB3.0 port optional and headset, microphone connection. It supports a VGA Card Length of up to 270mm and a CPU Cooler Height of 140mm. It has a power supply of 500W (real 200W), with 2sata,8cm fan,220V,1.2 M power cord & Cable Management Depth of 14mm. The MaxGreen 6503BK has no warranty.

full_description:
MaxGreen MGL03 Mid Tower ATX Casing With PSU

MaxGreen MGL03 is a  Mid Tower ATX PC Casing. The case is available in Black.It has a TOP/ATX PSU Form Factor.It supports ATX, Micro-ATX, ITX and Mini ITX motherboards. The front panel is made of ABS material and on both side panels, there are metal covers. Side cooling air hole structure ensures smooth air circulation to maintain optimum internal temperature. The I/O ports in this casing includes two USB2.0, one 3.5mm HD AUDIO jack, and one hi speed USB 3.0 jack.MGL03 has a total  of 7 Expansion Slots. The internal hard drive bay can house two 3.5 HDD or two 2.5 SSD hard drives. This casing comes with a preinstalled ATX MG-P500W Power Supply Unit. The Power Supply Unit is located on the upside of the case. This casings supports 120 mm or lower case cooler Fans. One 120mm case fan can be installed on the front or in the side panel. The pre-installed fan is a 120mm case fan at the Rear side. the maximum supported VGA length for this casing is 358mm while the maximum CPU height supported is 157mm. The dimension of the casing is 358 x 180 x 408 mm. MaxGreen MGL03 Mid Tower ATX Casing offers No Warranty.

MaxGreen MGK11 is a budget friendly ATX Mid Tower Casing. The front side has enough space to be fitted with  two 120mm or one 140 mm cooler fans. The dimension of the casing is 350 x 180 x 410 mm. MaxGreen MGK11 ATX Mid Tower Casing offers No Warranty.

full_description:
MaxGreen JX188-2 Mid-Tower RGB ATX Gaming Case

The MaxGreen JX188-2 Mid-Tower RGB Gaming Case is compatible with ATX/ M-ATX/ ITX motherboards. It has a 0.45mm steel structure, tempered glass, and plastic material. It features one USB3.0 port and one USB1.1 port. It also includes an HD Audio Port. The front panel of the case is plastic+mesh, while the left side panel is tempered glass with four screws. It comes with a previously equipped 4x RGB Fan. A half-transparent panel may be found on the left side. This shell contains 3 x 120mm front fan support, 2 x 120mm top fan support, 1 x 120mm rear fan support, and 2 x 120mm rear radiator support. MaxGreen has designed an appealing enclosure. The MaxGreen JX188-2 Mid-Tower RGB ATX Gaming Case has no warranty.

Measuring 340(L)*200(W)*449(H)mm, the MaxGreen 821 Mid-Tower ARGB ATX Gaming Case is a mid-sized tower that provides ample room for your components while still being compact enough to fit on a desk or in a small space. The case offers ample clearance space, with a maximum CPU cooler height of 160mm, a maximum graphics card length of 280mm, and a maximum PSU length of 170mm. It has a bottom and top cover with a dust filter.  It supports a VGA Card Length of 340mm and a CPU Cooler Height of 155mm. It comes with Built-in Rainbow Controller (ARGB+PWM V1.62) so that lighting can be controlled by the inner program while the motherboard is without RGB function. It has two buttons on the top panel for changing different colors according to your mood. It has no warranty.
